---
title: "Avoid string interpolation for I/O"
format: revealjs
---


:::: {style="font-size: 0.5em" }
When writing data to a file (or other I/O device), forming extra intermediate strings is a source of overhead. Instead of:
::::

```{.julia}
println(file, "$a $b")
```

use:

```{.julia}
println(file, a, " ", b)
```
